title: Kevin Giddis on Bonds: Shorten Duration, Ride It Out (Audio)
itunes:title: Kevin Giddis on Bonds: Shorten Duration, Ride It Out (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: FED IN FOCUS: Kevin Giddis, Head of Fixed Income at Raymond James, on the bond market reaction to the Fed minutes, and investment outlook.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
